name: Magnetics & Inductors
description: Sector template for magnetic component patents including inductors, transformers, and capacitors.
contextDescription: Magnetics and inductor patents cover passive components in electronic systems. Key areas include power inductors (H01F), transformers, magnetic materials, and capacitors. High-value targets include passive component vendors (Murata, TDK, Vishay), power supply designs, and integrated power solutions. These components are essential for power conversion and filtering.
scoringGuidance: Power inductor patents target mobile device power management.
Transformer patents apply to power supplies and isolation.
Integrated magnetics patents target SoC power solutions.
High-frequency magnetics patents target RF and wireless charging.
Consider both discrete components and integrated solutions.

questions.question: What magnetic component does this patent cover (inductor, transformer, capacitor)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the component type and its applications.

questions.question: Is this patent relevant to power conversion or power management?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Power is the primary application for magnetics.

questions.question: Can this be integrated into semiconductor packages or SoCs?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Integrated magnetics is a growing trend.
